Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.treasures

Item classes of Entities that can be picked up by the player

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boots
    boots treasure.
    Chip
    Chips are needed to open the socket.
    Filler  
    FireBoots
    Fire boots stop you from dying in fire.
    Flippers
    Flippers stop you dying in water.
    IceBoots
    Lets the player walk on ice.
    Key
    A Key is a treasure that is used to open a door
    KeyBlue
    Blue keys are destroyed when a block or monster stands on them.
    KeyGreen
    Green keys are not consumed on use.
    KeyRed
    Red keys open red locked doors.
    KeyYellow
    Yellow keys act as a wall to blocks and monsters when on the ground.
    SuctionBoots
    Suction boots treasure.
    Treasure
    Generic class for all consumable pickups within the game, all consumable object types will extend this and this will contain universal information about items.

Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.treasures Description

Item classes of Entities that can be picked up by the player
